entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:32 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Windsor Airport 11:32 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
